name: Fetchr
headline: The Personal Shopper  in Your Pocket
description: Fetchr is the first personalized shopping app for clothes. Let Fetchr buy you clothes uniquely tailored to you — without any work.

founders.name: Calvin Chen, Founder
founders.description:
Calvin launched an inventory management SaaS that hit $1.5M ARR before a $9M acquisition in high school and later founded Rent-A-Fit, partnering with top retailers and growing to thousands of users. He studied business and CS at USC before dropping out.

After YC, Calvin onboarded Navid Pour as Co-Founder and CTO, Navid was the second engineer at Cursor (where he helped build Cursor Tab) and built Stagehand at Browserbase.

generated_description:
Fetchr is an intriguing startup that aims to redefine the shopping experience, positioning itself as "The Personal Shopper in Your Pocket." Founded in 2023 and hailing from the illustrious Y Combinator Batch W23, Fetchr started with a clear mission: to curate clothing shopping tailored specifically to individual preferences without the usual hassle.

Located in San Francisco, Fetchr operates with a tight-knit team of just four employees. This small yet agile team is piloted by Gustaf Alstromer, a seasoned partner with a finger on the pulse of consumer-driven tech innovations.

So, how does Fetchr work its magic? It’s surprisingly straightforward. The platform learns your unique style by engaging you in a series of questions about your fashion preferences. Using those insights, Fetchr combs through a vast array of options across the internet to present you with the perfect items—think of it as having a personal shopper who does all the legwork for you. 

What if you find something you love? Fetchr allows you to buy risk-free, complete with free shipping and returns. You can dip your toes into this personalized shopping experience for just $20 a month. They assure you with a money-back guarantee, reinforcing their commitment to customer satisfaction.

To summarize: Fetchr is about reducing the friction in shopping, blending AI with consumer insight to create a seamless, tailored experience. If you’re tired of sifting through endless online options and wish for a solution that respects your time and style, Fetchr might just be the personal shopper you've been searching for. 

The future looks promising for Fetchr—it's a modern take on fashion convenience, and it’s worth keeping an eye on. You can check them out and join their waitlist at [Fetchr's website](https://www.fetchr.so).
